# Request for Standing Offer: Facilitation Services

## Request Summary

The Office of the Chief Electoral Officer of Canada (Elections Canada) is seeking to establish a standing offer for facilitation services for meetings with internal and external stakeholders. The contractor will provide planning, development, and facilitation services for various cyclical and ad-hoc meetings.

## Services Required

The contractor will provide facilitation services at a senior and junior level to support Elections Canada in planning, designing, organizing, and conducting meetings across Canada. These meetings may include, but are not limited to:

* Executive Committee meetings
* All-staff meetings
* External stakeholder meetings with representatives of national organizations, parliamentarians, and political parties

The contractor will use traditional and technology-enhanced facilitation approaches and means, including videoconferencing, teleconferencing, facilitation software, social media, and other technology.

## Contract Period

The contract period will be from the effective date until March 31, 2025, with an option to extend for three additional periods of one year each.

## Submission of Proposals

Proposals must be submitted electronically through the epost Connect service. For further information, refer to the complete Request for Standing Offer (RSO) document.

## Selection Criteria

The selection methodology is a competitive procurement strategy based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Contact Information

For any enquiries or other communication, please contact Stefania Menasce, Contracting Authority, at Stefania.Menasce@elections.ca or (873) 416-1578.

## Notice URL

Note: The Request for Standing Offer (RSO) document is available on the Canada Buys website.
